mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product_Img_Tb(File_Name, Product_Num, IsMain) VALUES (#{file_Name}, #{product_Num}, #{isMain})

INSERT INTO Product_Tb(Id,Market_Name,Category,Title,Cont,Event) VALUES (product_tb_seq.nextval,#{market_name},#{category},#{title},#{cont},#{event})
select product_tb_seq.currval from dual

INSERT INTO ProductDetail_Tb(Id,Product_Id,Product_Name,Product_Price,Product_Discount,Product_Count,DateStart,DateEnd) VALUES (product_detail_tb_seq.nextval,#{product_Id},#{product_Name},#{product_Price},#{product_Discount},#{product_Count},#{dateStart},#{dateEnd})
select product_detail_tb_seq.currval from dual
mapper.select: select id, title from product_tb where market_name = #{marketName}
select a.productdetailid ,a.count, b.product_name from purchasedetaillist_tb a, productdetail_tb b where a.purchaselistid = #{orderNum} and a.productdetailid = b.id

SELECT (R.STAR) FROM MARKET_TB M JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON M.NAME = P.MARKET_NAME JOIN REVIEW_TB R ON P.ID = R.PRODUCT_NUM WHERE SELLERID = #{user_id} AND R.TIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')

SELECT U.id as id , M.NAME as marketname, M.SELLERID as sellerid , P.TITLE as title, U.USER_ID as buyerid, U.TOTALPRICE as totalprice, U.DELIVERY as delivery, U.TIME as purchasetime, TO_CHAR(U.PURCHASECONFIRMTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as purchaseconfirmtime FROM MARKET_TB M LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON M.NAME = P.MARKET_NAME LEFT JOIN PURCHASELIST_TB U ON P.ID = U.PRODUCTID WHERE U.PURCHASECONFIRMTIME BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{start}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AND M.SELLERID = #{user_id}

SELECT T.ID as id, T.PRICE as price, T.COUNT as count, T.SALE as sale, T.PRODUCTDETAILID as productdetailid, T.PURCHASELISTID as purchaselistid, P.PRODUCT_NAME as product_name FROM PURCHASEDETAILLIST_TB T LEFT JOIN PRODUCTDETAIL_TB P ON T.PRODUCTDETAILID = P.ID WHERE PURCHASELISTID = #{id}

select a.id,to_char(a.time,'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') as time,a.state,b.title,w.user_name,w.user_tel,w.user_address,w.user_email from purchaselist_tb a, product_tb b, user_tb w where state = 6 and b.market_name = #{marketName} and a.user_id = w.user_id
SELECT A.PRICE,A.SALE,A.COUNT,B.PRODUCT_NAME AS PRODUCTNAME FROM PURCHASEDETAILLIST_TB A, PRODUCTDETAIL_TB B WHERE A.purchaselistid = #{purchaselistid} and a.productdetailid = b.id
select * from product_tb where deletecheck = 0 and market_name = #{marketName}

select listagg(name, '>') within group (order by level desc) as name, listagg(num, '>') within group (order by level desc) as num from category_tb start with num = #{num} connect by num = prior parent_num

select ID,PRODUCT_ID,PRODUCT_NAME,PRODUCT_PRICE,PRODUCT_DISCOUNT,PRODUCT_COUNT,to_char(DATESTART,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DATESTART,to_char(DATEEND,'YYYY-MM-DD') as DATEEND,DELETECHECK from productdetail_tb where product_id = #{productId}

SELECT COUNT(P.TOTALPRICE) as count FROM PURCHASELIST_TB P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_TB R ON P.PRODUCTID = R.ID LEFT JOIN MARKET_TB M ON R.MARKET_NAME = M.NAME WHERE P.PURCHASECONFIRMTIME BETWEEN TO_DATE('20000101', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('20231201', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.SELLERID = #{id}

SELECT SUM(P.TOTALPRICE) as beforeSettleSum FROM PURCHASELIST_TB P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_TB R ON P.PRODUCTID = R.ID LEFT JOIN MARKET_TB M ON R.MARKET_NAME = M.NAME WHERE SETTLECHECK = 0 AND P.PURCHASECONFIRMTIME BETWEEN TO_DATE('20000101', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('20231201', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND M.SELLERID = #{id}
